Webinar: Web Services Test Automation 101
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Most modern software systems are built based on a service-oriented architecture. Web services encapsulate business functionality, which is used by lean user interfaces and other software systems.
This separation between representation (UI) and pure functionality fundamentally changes how users approach testing. Instead of concentrating on a user interface which normally stabilizes late in a project, testing can start as soon as the first web service interfaces are defined. Join our webinar as Georg Thurner, Product Manager, shows you how to:
- Easily create web service tests with Tosca - Enable non-technical testers to test web services - Combine the power of risk based test automation with web service tests - Run true end-2-end tests
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
